John Singleton made sure to tell our stories on the big screen in an authentic way that only someone from where he’s from could tell, all the while ensuring that our community benefitted. By doing so, he changed Hollywood forever, as well as South L.A.

Wishing John Singleton a speedy recovery.

The summary and the press conference were attempts to shape a narrative that is patently false. 

The report made clear that the President is not exonerated and that the responsibility now falls to Congress to hold the Trump accountable for his actions. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/04/18/us/politics/mueller-report-russian-interference-donald-trump.html?action=click&module=Spotlight&pgtype=Homepage …

“No collusion” 6 times during the press conference? 

Just sound bites for FOX News from Trump’s personal lawyer - Bill Barr

It's now clear -- This Attorney General does not work for us, he works for President Trump. 

This press conference was a final desperate cry to keep the truth away from the American people. 

We’re not falling for it. Give us the report.

Embarrassingly obvious -- The purpose of Attorney General Barr's press conference two hours before giving the Mueller report to Congress is to make sure FOX News and other right wing media outlets have the administration's talking points.
Trump first announced the AG Barr press conference tomorrow... Is there anyone who believes Trump hasn't seen the entire report???

No family should EVER go through what Wakeisha Wilson’s mother went through three years ago when she was notified her daughter had died in jail only after she didn't appear in court. 

We must reform our system.

Today is #EqualPayDay, which represents the day that women collectively earn as much as men did at the end of last year. 

In every state, in nearly every industry, women are still earning less than men for doing the same work. We must pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct.

So proud to participate in today’s FIRST-EVER hearing on the #EqualityAct. 

No one should be denied housing, the ability to attend school or apply for a mortgage, or to serve on a jury because of their sexual orientation or gender identity.

Today is the day that we gave AG Barr as a deadline for Mueller's report to be released. 

Tomorrow is the day that we will begin the process of authorizing subpoenas for the report because we don’t get it. 

The people paid for the report, now it’s time for them to see it.

Nipsey’s legacy will live on in all of those who continue to uplift, those who continue to inspire, and those who continue to lift as they climb. 

My heart goes out to his family and the community that loved and admired him. 3/3

He loved his community and it showed.
